content.rendered:
2017 America’s Cup Rates

The rates below are based on a standard package including five nights hotel stay and dockyard viewing. However, you can completely customize your package with VIP race viewing, premium hospitality, additional events and parties, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades and other add-ons.
Hotel PackageRoom TypePackages From
Elbow Beach ResortLanai Room$2,695
Elbow Beach ResortOcean View Room$2,925
Fairmont SouthamptonFairmont Room$3,495
Fairmont SouthamptonDeluxe Sea View Room$4,025
Fairmont SouthamptonSignature Suite$4,985
Rosewood Tucker's PointDeluxe Room$7,625
Rosewood Tucker's PointSuiteCall for Rates
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% deposit will hold your spot. Final balance is due March 27, 2017. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
